name: com.sinkii09.engine
description: A comprehensive, service-oriented game engine framework with advanced actor management, resource handling, and save/load systems. Features strongly-typed APIs, DOTween integration, and modern async/await patterns. Supports both DOTween (free) and DOTween Pro with automatic feature detection.

dotween.name: DOTween (Free or Pro)
dotween.fallback: None - DOTween is required for engine functionality

features.free: Basic tweening, standard easing functions, sequence support
features.pro: Advanced features: custom easing curves, timeline editor, visual scripting, enhanced performance

dotween.recommendation: DOTween Pro recommended for best performance and features, but DOTween Free is fully supported
dotween.installation: Must be installed manually from Unity Asset Store
